content: the easy diagonal scarf crochet pattern is just that… easy you can make any simple striped scarf a little extra fun by making it diagonal i used basic stitch from lion brand in 3 colors for my scarf but any worsted weight yarn would work just fine i used less than 100g of each color this pattern is an inexpensive ad free clearly formatted pdf instant download that is available for free on my blog https //www hookedonhomemadehappiness com/easy-diagonal-scarf-crochet-pattern/ materials-- worsted weight yarn in 3 colors less than 100g each color i used lion brand basic stitch in goldmine boysenberry charcoal i/5 5 mm hook yarn needle scissors level-- easy approx finished size-- 60 x 6 written in us terms **if you have any questions please don t hesitate to contact me** you may not sell or claim my patterns as your own you may sell finished products made from my patterns but please link back to the post and give credit for the pattern
